android-demos.commit_message: These are all the initial demos
Added a demo of Dynamic List Items
Added an example of using the tab host as there does not seem to be anything else available. STILL!
Added a multiple activity tabhost demo.
removed the 'improved' class which I commited by mistake
Added an example of tab switching with both one,selfcontained activity and many activities in each tab.
updated the gitignore not to include classes
Deleted class files which had been inadvertedly added.
Removed the .DS_Store files which had been added by mistake.
Added demos for List styles and notifications
Adding the new live Wallpaper demos
Updated the demos to store the IDs of the resources rather than putting all the Bitmaps into memory. Runs fast enough on the phone so seems like they don't need to be taking up memory.
Created an app that displays text columns in a webview, with menu options for text zoom. Three different layouts are available.
Changed a few little conventions. Based on code review.

Renamed webview_menu to webview_main_menu
Created an ids file for all ids used in the layout and menu.
Modified the string and id names to follow naming conventions
Refactored the switch statements in HelloWebView

Created the PinchZoomDetector project. Implemented this class in the FixedSizeTextColumns, and checked wether a device has a multiple touch screen or not. Also, increased minimum required version to 2.1
Made it clear within the exception when unencrpyted passwords were being shown.
Moved the cipher vars to constants.
Changed the icon slightly, made the project compatible to android 1.6
Added a cusomt transition demo. In this demo I simply turn off the transition but this demo can now be used to try ou tany other transition quickly in future.
Deleted activities launch mode demo - moved it to a seperate repo
Added a simple example originally modified from javacodegeeks.com
Added the first of the fragment demos.
Carousel currently shows hiding and traversing.
IDs of clicked carousel elements are now shown when clicked.
bumped version of pom and chanegd from common to android
-added activity to handle basic compass and accelerometer values
Image rotation and translation. Not still functional
actionbar now activate deactivates the compass
first integration with compass but still not working fine
it was not in the correct package
-fixing bits of the rotated image view
-using a rotatable imageview till the multi otuch view is ready
adding map api v2 demo, updating gitignore

for us
Improve Splitwise's demo to add the features we need

Clean up the code a bit and add a couple of features:

 - Make tags selectable
 - Use a different resource for selected tags
 - When the 'Enter' key is pressed add the text as a tag and don't hide
   the keyboard
Remove unnecessary dependencies and use gradle 2.14
Show hint even when tags have leading spaces
Don't let the user select the hint, not even the first character
Code cleanup: Extract classes and move code around
Fix the RegEx for detecting leading spaces
Move both demos to a their own package each
Rename classes to have shorter names
Renames YOLO suggestions because they're not YOLO
Extract methods and simplify the code a bit
Use the dependency from jcenter directly
